body.name: Steamer for Clothes, Portable Handheld Garment Steamer for Fabric Wrinkles Remover, 15s Fast Heat-up, 90ml Water Tank with Heat-Resistant Gloves, Convenient clothes steamer for Home, Office and Travel
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 31 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 22 hrs 16 mins
features: 【15-Second Fast Heating】: Our G5 clothes steamer adopts advanced heating technology and only takes 15 seconds to heat. The heating time is faster than other steamer which notably enhances efficiency. The powerful steam permeates the fabric, swiftly smoothing out wrinkles and easily resolving wrinkles. Excellent heating speed and excellent wrinkle removal ability make it ideal for fast and efficient garment care. (Note: Need heating for 15s before use, otherwise, it won't produce a mist

【Multi-angle rotation & Included Heat-Resistant Gloves】: Our G5 garment steamer has a flexible rotation design that allows you to iron clothes either laid flat or hung, based on your preference. Ensuring smooth and efficient ironing. No matter which method you choose, it can effectively remove wrinkles. To enhance safety and prevent accidental burns, we provide heat-resistant gloves. (Note: Please select the ironing ways before use and avoid rotating mid-process to prevent burns

【Easy to Carry & Package List】: Our G5 portable garment steamer is designed for easy portability, compact, lightweight, and easy to carry, making it convenient to use during travel or daily life.(Note: Only suitable for use in the US, Mexico, Taiwan, and Japan. Using it in Europe or other 220-240V areas may result in a short circuit of the machine) Our package includes: Garment Steamer *1 (Power Cord Length: 1.8m), Velvet Bag *1, User Manual *1, Warranty Card *1, Heat-Resistant Gloves *1)

【Easy Operation & Applicable Fabrics】: Our G5 steamer iron for clothes is simple and easy to use. Before use, please check the water tank, plug in the power, and wait for the indicator light to turn on. After 15s of warm-up, the indicator light will turn off and it is ready for use without the need for more complicated operations. Equipped with 90ml detachable water tank, it supports steaming for over 10 min. The steamer is suitable for silk, linen, cotton, nylon, polyester, and so on

【noanul's In-time After-Sales Service Support】: Our G5 portable garment steamer comes with 1-year return, 3-year repair, and lifetime technical support. We've prepared step-by-step instructions so you can learn how to do it. Any questions we will provide you with the most satisfactory solution within 24 hours!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am thoroughly impressed with its performance, design, and overall convenience. The packaging of the clothes steamer was top-notch. It arrived securely packed, and the presentation indicated a level of care and attention to detail. The protective packaging ensured that the steamer was in perfect condition upon opening. The quality of this clothes steamer is exceptional. The advanced heating technology is a standout feature, as it heats up in just 15 seconds, providing quick and efficient results. The construction is sturdy, and the materials used are of high quality, promising durability over time. The flexible rotation design is a game-changer. It allows for the steaming of clothes whether they are laid flat or hung, catering to individual preferences. This versatility is a thoughtful addition, providing a seamless ironing experience. The compact and lightweight design, coupled with easy portability, makes it incredibly convenient for both travel and daily use. Using this clothes steamer is a breeze. It's simple, straightforward, and doesn't require any complicated setup. The user-friendly design ensures that even those new to clothes steaming can quickly adapt. The compact size and easy portability make it a practical choice for on-the-go use. Lastly, it also comes with a velvet carry case and a heat-protective glove. The carry case adds a touch of luxury and makes it even more convenient for travel, while the heat-protective glove ensures safety during use, preventing any accidental burns. Overall, I am highly satisfied with this clothes steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer for Wrinkle-Free Perfection!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased this Portable Handheld Garment Steamer, and it has completely transformed my approach to clothing care. This little powerhouse deserves nothing less than a glowing 5-star review!From the moment I unpacked it, I was impressed by its sleek design and compact size. It's incredibly lightweight, making it the perfect travel companion for business trips or vacations. The ergonomic handle ensures a comfortable grip, allowing me to effortlessly navigate through various fabrics.But let's talk performance - this steamer means business! Within seconds, it produces a steady flow of powerful steam that quickly banishes wrinkles and leaves my clothes looking fresh and professionally pressed. I no longer dread last-minute outfit changes, as this steamer delivers results in record time.What sets this steamer apart is its versatility. It works wonders on a wide range of fabrics, from delicate silks to sturdy denims.One of the standout features is the quick heat-up time. In just a matter of seconds, the steamer is ready for action, saving me valuable time during my morning routine. The water reservoir is also generous, ensuring a continuous steaming session without frequent refills.Cleaning and maintenance are a breeze, thanks to the user-friendly design. The detachable water tank and easy-to-access components make it simple to keep the steamer in top-notch condition.I wholeheartedly recommend this Portable Handheld Garment Steamer to anyone in search of a reliable, efficient, and user-friendly solution for wrinkle-free clothing. It has become an indispensable part of my daily routine, and I can confidently say that it has exceeded my expectations. Say goodbye to traditional ironing hassles and hello to a new era of garment care with this stellar portable steamer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Wrinkle-Free Steamer
reviews.reviewText: This product is such a perfect on the go steamer which makes it great for travel and comes with a travel bag. In less than 15 seconds it is ready to use. It can also be rotated for ironing, and it comes with gloves to prevent scalding your hands. Overall, I was impressed with this product because of how easy it is to use and cools down extremely fast. I would recommend this product because it is a nice size and works perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Handheld steamer
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this handheld steamer, and I must say it is awesome. This compact and powerful device is a game-changer for anyone looking to quickly and effectively de-wrinkle their outfits.The steamer's performance exceeded my expectations. With a rapid heat-up time and a continuous steam flow, it effortlessly removed wrinkles from my clothes, leaving them looking crisp and professional. The compact design makes it easy to maneuver around buttons, collars, and seams, ensuring a thorough steaming experience.One of the standout features is the user-friendly design. The ergonomic handle provides a comfortable grip, and the lightweight construction allows for easy handling. The inclusion of a long power cord ensures flexibility in reaching various areas without being restricted. I also found it amazing that it can pretty much be used like an iron also as the head pivots. Within 15 seconds, the device is heated up and ready to begin steaming.One aspect I appreciate is the inclusion of a thermal glove in the package. This safety feature adds an extra layer of protection during operation. The glove is designed to shield your hand from the hot steam, preventing any accidental burns or discomfort. I found it particularly useful when working on delicate fabrics or intricate designs, allowing me to steam with confidence.I love that this steamer comes with a 3-year waranty which gives me satisfaction that if something should go wrong I will be able to get this fixed. I also love that the vendor provides their email for any question you may have.In conclusion, this steamer offers a combination of performance and safety. With its efficient wrinkle-removing capabilities and the thoughtful inclusion of a thermal glove, this device is a reliable companion for anyone seeking a convenient and secure solution for garment care.
